entities.name: colin creevey
entities.description: Colin Creevey is a third year student who looks up to Harry as a hero.

entities.name: dennis creevey
entities.description: Dennis Creevey is Colin's brother and will be starting at Hogwarts.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a student who is being looked up to by Colin Creevey.

entities.name: parvati patil
entities.description: Parvati Patil's twin sister is in Ravenclaw.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is a student who corrects Harry's assumption about siblings being in the same house.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is a friend of Harry's.

entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: Nearly Headless Nick is a ghost who is present at the table with Harry.

relationships.description: Colin Creevey mentions that his brother Dennis will be starting at Hogwarts.
Harry is sitting with Hermione Granger and Ron Weasley.
Parvati Patil's twin sister is in Ravenclaw.
Harry hopes that Colin's brother will be in Gryffindor.
